news.text: IEEE %%SciVis Contest%% submission "VisAnywhere: Developing Multi-platform Scientific Visualization Applications" was awarded 1st Place at IEEE VIS (Visualization Conference) 2023.
Paper titled "Interactive Virtual Reality Exploration of Large-scale Datasets using Omnidirectional Stereo Images" was presented at %%ISVC%% (International Symposium on Visual Computing) 2022.

Paper titled "GPU-based Image Compression for Efficient Compositing in Distributed Rendering Applications" was presented at %%LDAV%% (Big Data Analysis and Visualization) held in conjunction with IEEE Vis 2021.

Paper titled "Enabling Collaborative Interaction with 360° Panoramas between Large-scale Displays and Immersive Headsets" was presented as a poster at %%IEEE ISMAR%% (International Symposium on Mixed and Augmented Reality) 2021.

IEEE VR paper titled "Real-Time Omnidirectional Stereo Rendering: Generating 360° Surround-View Panoramic Images for Comfortable Immersive Viewing" was presented at %%ACM SIGGRAPH%% 2021 as an invited talk.
Co-taught the %%Coding for Science%% high school computing workshop – a free 5-day enrichment experience hosted at Argonne National Laboratory.
